column3: Traffic;Kampong Chhnang:------ On the 31st of March 2019
column4: a structure on National Road 5 in Kompong Chhnang collapsed again.------ The structure put up celebrating the Kampong Chhnang River Festival in front of Psarlar Referral Hospital. Kampong Chhnang Province first toppled over on------ February 23------ and possibly again after (think it was in the news when the wind was about
